text:
Marek Antoni Frąckowiak (16 August 1950 – 6 November 2017) was a Polish actor. He had roles in "Niespotykanie spokojny człowiek", "Ekipa", "Ballada o Januszku" and "The Last Wish". He also voiced many popular movies, television shows and video games from outside of Poland into Polish.
Frąckowiak was born in Łódź. He was married to Ewa Złotowska.
Frąckowiak died of spinal cancer on 6 November 2017 in Łódź. He was 67.
